results.message: A title should be provided for the document, using a non-empty title element in the head section.
The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.
If this image cannot be fully described in a short text alternative, ensure a long text alternative is also available, such as in the body text or through a link.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.
Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.

results.context: Dr Chiu, Koh and Gan's Practice
results.message: Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.
